UFOCFGPLAIN
pluginDirectory "../../../../../install/lib/"
pluginDirectory "../../../../../../../lib"
/* *****************  Flock of Boids ************************ */
immediate FLOCK Flock {
	children {
		fromTemplate PILOT swarmPilot {
			children {
				fromTemplate STEERABLE swarmSteerable {
					parameters {
						environmentId = 1
							entityId = 28
					}
				}
			}
		}
		fromTemplate PILOT swarmPilot {
			children {
				fromTemplate STEERABLE swarmSteerable {
					parameters {
						environmentId = 1
							entityId = 29
					}
				}
			}
		}

		fromTemplate PILOT swarmPilot {
			children {
				fromTemplate STEERABLE swarmSteerable {
					parameters {
						environmentId = 1
							entityId = 127
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
template swarmSteerable STEERABLE InVRsSteerable {
	parameters { /* set common parameters, but don't specify steered Entity: */
		useSimplePhysicsEntity = false
			VMax = 10
	} 
}
template swarmPilot PILOT Pilot
{
	children {
		immediate BEHAVIOUR CachingBehaviour {
			parameters { deltaTMin = 0.04 }
			children {
				immediate BEHAVIOUR AverageBehaviour {
					children {
						immediate BEHAVIOUR ScaleBehaviour {
							parameters { scaleFactor = 0.1 }
							children {
								immediate BEHAVIOUR FollowWaypointsBehaviour {
									parameters { 
										waypoint = "181.81 22.0 206.76"
											epsilon = 0.0
									} 
								}
							}
						}
						immediate BEHAVIOUR FaceForwardBehaviour { }
						immediate BEHAVIOUR ScaleBehaviour {
							parameters { scaleFactor = 5 }
							children {
								immediate BEHAVIOUR RandomBehaviour { }
							}
						}
						immediate BEHAVIOUR AlignmentBehaviour { 
							parameters { neighbourDistance = 15.0 }
						}
						immediate BEHAVIOUR CohesionBehaviour { 
							parameters { neighbourDistance = 5.0 }
						}
						immediate BEHAVIOUR ScaleBehaviour {
							parameters { scaleFactor = 5 }
							children {
								immediate BEHAVIOUR SeparationBehaviour { 
									parameters { neighbourDistance = 1.0 }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
